10 READ A,B:IF A=999 THEN 200
20 REM SOUNDA/2,B/16
30 LPRINTA/2;B/16
40 GOTO10

80 DATA 196,40,196,40,247,40,294,40
90 DATA 392,120,330,160,330,160,330,80,262,40,294,40
100 DATA 330,40,294,360,196,40,196,40,247
110 DATA 40,294,40,294,120,220,200,247,20
120 DATA 247,20,262,40,247,40,220,40,192,320
130 DATA 999,999

200 SOUND87,4:SOUND113,4:SOUND142,4:SOUND193,8:SOUND161,10:SOUND161,10:SOUND161,5:SOUND129,4 
210 SOUND142,4:SOUND161,4:SOUND142,16:SOUND87,4:SOUND87,4:SOUND113, 2:SOUND142,4:SOUND142,8 
220 SOUND103,12:SOUND113,1:SOUND113,1:SOUND129,4:SOUND113,4:SOUND103,4:SOUND87,16 
230 END
